comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Could be www.arlingtoncemetery.net/rupatterson.htm Robert Urie Patterson This article suggests that he headed the first aid division of the Red Cross between 1913 and when the USA joined WW1. www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=7569 has a photo that could be the same man when older. NLM has a photo of him when younger: ihm.nlm.nih.gov/luna/servlet/detail/NLMNLM~1~1~101440239~...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks swanq for the additional information on Robert Urie Patterson.  We will add some of it to the image description when we update.
